item.description:
Explore this Boston landmark neighborhood - with your iPod or MP3 player as your tour guide. This hour-long audio tour will guide you along the Fort Point Channel Harborwalk to places you never knew existed.

This FREE walking tour is set to an original soundtrack of industrial beats and ethereal rhythms.
* Hear sculptor Ana Crowley give an insider's view of an artist-owned co-op building
* Step back to the 1950's at the underground Lucky's Lounge
* Check out where Martin Sheen met his demise in the Oscar-winning The Departed.

Download the audio tour:"Fort Point Channel Tour"

If you would like to carpooling please indicate it in your RSVP so, you can make arrangements with other interested members. Below are the Park & Ride locations and Public Transportation websites.

Car Pool:
NH - Park & Ride Lots
MA - Park & Ride Lots
ME - Park & Ride Lots

Public Transportation:
"Nashua - Boston Express
"Mass Bay Transportation Authority"

Things to bring: Camera, IPOD/(MP3 Player (recorded CD)), Ear phones,Water, Snack, Suntan Lotion.

After the walk we will find a local restaurant to eat at.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be infront of South Station wearing a MEET-UP "Fan" pin.
item.name: The Fort Point Channel MP3 Tour
